title: Can Jisoo of Blackpink speak English well? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unfortunately, she can’t speak English as fluent as Jennie and Rosé. You can clearly see it in Blackpink’s interviews with GMA and Apple Music. She usually stays mute and does not speak that much. Because compared to the other Blackpink members, Jisoo is the only one who was born and fully raised in South Korea. So I understand how hard it is for her to speak in English considering her education background. However, she can read and understand English perfectly. She just can’t speak English well because she’s afraid to mess the grammar and tenses.

Because she never got taught. With three out of four members speaking English it wasn't necessary for her to learn, although she understand English she doesn't speak it. Rosé speaks English because she was born in Australia so English is her first language. Jennie speaks English because she grew up in New Zealand (she was born in Korea but lived in new Zealand for five years before going back to Korea to become a singer) Lisa was taught to speak English at Yg Entertainment

upvoters.user_id: ลินด์คลินิก Lynd Clinic

response.answer_text: Because she didn’t grow up in a predominantly English speaking country or go to an international school/school where English is taught. The other 3 members of BlackPink happen to grow up speaking English: Rose is Korean but was born in New Zealand and grew up in Australia, Jennie was born in Korea but studied abroad in New Zealand for most of her childhood, and Lisa is Thai and English is taught in school there. FYI, it is not require for Kpop or Kpop groups for be able to speak English.
